remarks: Orthomodular law for constructed vector space H. Lemma 3.3(1) in [Holland95] p. 215.  ( ~ poml4N analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 15-Jan-2015.)
statement:
dihoml4.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihoml4.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihoml4.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` U ) $.
dihoml4.o $e |- ._|_ = ( ( ocH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihoml4.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
dihoml4.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. S ) $.
dihoml4.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. S ) $.
dihoml4.c $e |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` Y ) ) = Y ) $.
dihoml4.l $e |- ( ph -> X C_ Y ) $.
dihoml4 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( ._|_ ` ( ( ._|_ ` X ) i^i Y ) ) i^i Y ) = ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` X ) ) ) $.
